section.title: Description
section.p: This class links Health Concern (aka "Problem") entries. The relatedConcernCategory code provides an indication of how the entries are related.

stentry.p: This property provides an indication of how the entries are related. Possible values include: Replaces, Replaced By, Parent, Child, etc.
Identifies the Health Concern (aka "Problem") entry to which the original entry (i.e., the entry that points to this class) is related.
